king the gift which was curated and

death he undergoes a journey of
self-identity as he becomes a man using
the guidance of his ancestor played by
beyonce along with a childhood love and
his own subconscious trying to reclaim
his throne the journey for the prince
serves as an allegory for the african
diaspora's journey of discovery
reclaiming and celebrating their culture
and heritage which is accentuated by the
spoken word poetry that focuses on the
question of black identity history is
your future
